SEARCH
Package io.github.elimelt.pmqueue

Class QueueConfig

java.lang.Object
io.github.elimelt.pmqueue.QueueConfig
public class QueueConfig extends Object
Configuration for a message queue. This class is immutable and thread-safe. Example usage: 

 QueueConfig config = new QueueConfig.Builder()
     .filePath(filePath)
     .debugEnabled(true)
     .checksumEnabled(true)
     .maxFileSize(1024 * 1024 * 1024)
     .initialFileSize(4096)
     .defaultBufferSize(1024 * 1024)
     .maxBufferSize(8 * 1024 * 1024)
     .batchThreshold(64)
     .build();
